Install java in linux

11 Jul 2010

Fedora:

yum install java-1.6.0-openjdk*

Ubuntu:

sudo apt-get install openjdk-6-jre

This installs only openjdk-jre. To develop java programs, install

http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/o/openjdk-6/openjdk-6-jdk_6b11-2ubuntu2.2_i386.deb

Thats it.. :) Isnt it simple?
